name: Heart of Atoms
description:
Hello, this is my first Ludum Dare submission ever. Not a big fan of platformers, but, nevertheless, tried to make one.

DESCRIPTION:

You ended up in a nuclear power plant. The exit is on the other side, but you can't just run to it. The core is melting and can explode at any moment. The only thing you are left to do is to delay the catastrophe before you can escape.

CONTROLS:

A, D - walk, W/Space - jump, CTRL - fire
